tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
quoteText:
Comcast reserves the right to change these Terms.
When we do change them, we will make a copy of the updated Terms available to you by posting it at http://my.xfinity.com/terms/web/, in Xfinity My Account, or through other methods.
If we make material changes to these Terms, we will also notify you in Xfinity My Account, by email, direct mail, or other reasonable methods that we select.
